strategy: Aggressive momentum scalping with volatility filters. Targets high-beta names with strong intraday moves and tight risk management.

positions.reason: Breakout from consolidation on high volume, volatility expanding

trades.reason: Gap up on AI chip demand news, riding momentum
End of day, locking in gains before close
Strong relative strength, breaking out of range
Breakout from consolidation on high volume

mistakes: Sized META position too small — high conviction but only 5 shares
Missed the SMCI rip because I was focused on META
lessons: Size positions proportional to conviction level
Keep a watchlist scanner running to catch secondary setups
daily_review.strategy_evolution: Adding conviction-based position sizing. High conviction = up to 15% of portfolio. Also adding multi-stock tracking to avoid tunnel vision.
